Summary:
The AWS Partner Network (APN) Blog provides informative articles about AWS Partners across the globe. It highlights how AWS Specializations help customers find trusted cloud partners with diverse expertise. The four programs that provide technical validation based on AWS services, workloads, use cases, industries, and managed services are Service Delivery, Service Ready, Competency, and Managed Service Provider (MSP). The blog also features articles about how next-generation managed service providers (MSP) like Trek10 are delivering value through managed services offerings with support from the AWS MSP Program.

Additionally, the blog covers how streaming providers can curb illegal viewing through the integration of AWS and GeoGuard’s VPN blocking, a low-cost, easy-to-deploy, and quick ROI solution. It features how airlines can drive operational excellence with TCS Aviana, an AI-based solution developed by Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), that enables airlines to have comprehensive operations visibility, digital collaboration, and data-driven decision-making through connected insights and intelligence. 

The AWS Partner Network (APN) Blog also highlights how Pega and Amazon SageMaker can easily streamline the development and operationalization of machine learning models to improve process automation. Furthermore, it features how Wix combined Amazon GuardDuty and Orca Security to provide enterprise-grade security for over 230 million users. The blog also provides information about AWS's plans to offer Amazon EC2 instances powered by the newly-introduced fourth-generation AMD EPYC processors, and how Vix Technology partnered with AWS ProServe and Stromasys to successfully migrate over 100 applications to AWS. Finally, the blog celebrates the 10th anniversary of the AWS Partner Network (APN) by featuring Alert Logic, an AWS Competency Partner that provides managed detection and response (MDR) solutions for cloud applications.
